nodes.text: The Civic Spaceport was a small, public spaceport servicing the planet Naboo and located in the capital city of Theed.

Built in the city of Theed on Naboo, the civic spaceport was a public port which serviced citizens of the planet for their travel needs. The civic spaceport was located across from the Royal Palace and separated by the Solleu River. In 65 BBY, Magister Hego Damask of Damask Holdings and the InterGalactic Banking Clan proposed the expansion of the spaceport on the floodplains below the city cliffs. This expansion took overflow and larger ships that the civic spaceport could not accommodate.
